name: BoringBrands
description:
Conventional is good, but might be boring.
We at BoringBrands try and do stuff differently and generate buzz for firms which are the future… ie Startups! If you are a startup and looking to generate buzz for your firm… read on…
Every one has a story to tell, but it takes the right words, time and essence to make people listen… people who matter. With the constant hard work, time and effort, you are constantly generating stories. But, are are you making a sound and are people listening.
READ MORE...
